abstract: Forget fad diets and fitness gimmicks. Just stick to the basics.
lead_paragraph: Daytime television talk shows, popular podcasts and diet books on the New York Times best-seller list would have you believe that being healthy is complicated. You need to eat the latest superfood, buy the perfect supplements or join the hippest fitness cult. These theories are particularly popular right now, as people commit to New Yearâ€™s resolutions.
